data.title: Tesla recalls 817,000 vehicles in U.S. over seat belt reminder alert
data.description: Tesla Inc is recalling more than 817,000 vehicles in the United States because an audible alert may not activate when a vehicle starts and the driver has not buckled the seat belt, a U.S. auto safety regulator said.

data.title: Alphabet stock's big day could mean a windfall for Nancy Pelosi's husband
data.description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's husband, an investment manager and options trader, could be up big on Wednesday with Alphabet's equity pop.

data.title: Alphabet stock surges 10% on back of blowout earnings
data.description: The strong report led at least nine Wall Street firms to raise their price target on the stock.
